content.data: He rebuked his wife, realizing her welfare and because of the fear of public discussion, the husband kept silent, on this, that woman got enraged and going before the king of the town of Sambhal, she related the whole episode.170.
ਅਤੇ (ਅੰਤ ਵਿਚ ਉਸ ਨੇ) ਸੰਭਲ ਦੇ ਰਾਜੇ ਤਕ ਆ ਕੇ (ਸਾਰੀ ਗੱਲ) ਕਹਿ ਦਿੱਤੀ ॥੧੭੦॥
